    • checkCollision

      protected boolean checkCollision(GameObject obj1, GameObject obj2)
      Provides the logic to check if 2 gameObjects collide given their coordinates and their size
      Parameters:
      obj1 - first gameObject to check collision on
      obj2 - second gameObject to check collision on
      Returns:
      boolean, true if a collision has occured, false otherwise
